item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi! I’m Ruben Orrostieta, I’m a 29 year old looking to transition my career into something I really love. I have a chemical engineer academic formation but my passion in the past couple years has been technology, because of this and how my professional career has been evolving I decided to enroll in a Master of Science on Data Science at Colorado University Boulder. So far this has been quite a journey and hopefully I’ll have more details to share with you.

item.title: Welcome to MyBlog
item.description: Hello, thank you for taking some time to visit my blog. Here you can follow my experience transitioning into the technology industry, whether it is participating in bootcamps, idea brainstorm, project ideation among many others. I want to invite you to read my AboutMe to learn more about who am I and why I am starting this blog.
